status.message: Email info@garysdeliveries.com for Business Plan and Order List

product_desc: Gary’s Deliveries is founded in Eldridge, Houston Texas (garysdeliveries.com) with goal of providing qualitative and efficient food delivery services from different restaurants in Houston area to customers in a short period of time. Company’s target customers are restaurant customers who are ordering food and Company is delivering that food to the given address. The Company has one employee who is also owner of the company, driver, dispatcher and order taker. Company exists approximately three months and for that period of time has 30 loyal customers who are taking Company’s services daily, and with tendency of attracting new customers on weekly basis. For now, main focus of the Company is to maintain loyal customers and to attract new ones every day.
name: Gary's Deliveries
